name: Save The Cave
description:
Usually, when a cave is being looted, you play as the hero. 

In Save The Cave however, you play as the Spirit of The Cave trying to get rid of all uninvited so called "heroes" before they steal all your treasure and break all your walls. 

This is a game about quick puzzle solving were you will need to keep calm and be aware of your resources in order to achieve a high score. 

The game is a prototype meant to test the core mechanics. Feedback in the comment section is greatly appreciated! Bugs will most likely appear.
